name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LangPotato: Dual-Caption YouTube for Language Learners

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dual captioning of Youtube, specially designed for language learning.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:

• Dual-language subtitles
• Floating transcript window

Coming soon:
• Hover-to-translate
• AI-generated quizzes
• AI-powered speaking practice

LangPotato turns every YouTube video into an interactive language learning tool. Whether you're a beginner or advanced learner, this extension helps you make the most of your video-watching time.

Start improving your language skills today!
